metadata.title: CVE-2017-9755 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: opcodes/i386-dis.c in GNU Binutils 2.28 does not consider the number ofregisters for bnd mode, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated bymishandling of this file during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
